metadata.title: CVE-2016-5702 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: phpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3, when the environment lacks a PHP_SELF value,allows remote attackers to conduct cookie-attribute injection attacks via acrafted URI.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
